subject: Aviation Accidents and Safety
Airlines and Airplanes
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A small jet carrying the owner of Nascar’s top team, Rick Hendrick, and his wife, Linda, lost its brakes and crash-landed at a Key West, Fla., airport Monday night, but no one was seriously injured.
snippet: A small jet carrying the owner of Nascar’s top team, Rick Hendrick, and his wife, Linda, lost its brakes and crash-landed at a Key West, Fla., airport Monday night, but no one was seriously injured.
